Class BoxCookTickAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.evilcraft.tileentity.tickaction.spiritfurnace.BoxCookTickAction

    ITickAction<TileSpiritFurnace>

    public class BoxCookTickAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITickAction<TileSpiritFurnace>
    ITickAction that is able to cook boxes with spirits.
